alert.note: Alert for Greene (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 13 at 2:54PM CDT until April 13 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN GREENE...EASTERN CRAIGHEAD...EASTERN POINSETT... MISSISSIPPI...NORTHWESTERN CRITTENDEN...EASTERN CROSS AND SOUTHERN DUNKLIN COUNTIES... At 254 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Rector to near Caraway to 6 miles southwest of Tyronza, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Kennett, Osceola, Trumann, Gosnell, Manila, Marked Tree, Earle, Lake City, Leachville, Lepanto, Senath, Monette, Caraway, Parkin, Tyronza, Keiser, Cardwell, Hornersville, Joiner and Arbyrd. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for eastern Arkansas...southeastern Missouri...and western Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
